title: Creating a Sandbox World - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Evolution   Game Elements   God Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Industrialization   Magic   Male Protagonist   Multiple Identities   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Secret Identity   Secretive Protagonist   Spatial Manipulation   Strong to Stronger   Technological Gap   Time Manipulation   Time Skip   Virtual Reality
author: Hundred Thousand Dumplings   十万菜团
description:
Two years after graduation, Lin Tuo resigned from his job and returned to the countryside, trying to open a Martial Art school in this era where Martial Arts had declined. 

However, he never expected to find a mysterious Sandbox in his old house.

On the Sandbox, a modern city was constantly in motion. Upon closer inspection, he found that it was precisely the same as the city where he had worked and lived for years!

Lin Tuo leaned down curiously.

Earth, in the center of a certain city.

Countless citizens on the street raised their heads in astonishment and looked towards the sky.

“I’m not mistaken, am I? How… how did a face appear in the sky?!”>
